author: Andre Maniam JC:
casenumber: General Division of the High Court — Suit No 909 of 2020 (Summons No 531 of 2021)
casename: Transasia Private Capital Ltd (in its capacity as manager, for and on behalf of Asian Trade Finance Fund, a sub-fund of TA Asian Multi-Finance Fund) v Todi Ashish
counsel: Janice Han Jia Lin (Tan Peng Chin LLC) for the plaintiff; Defendant absent.

headings.text: The court’s power to consider a claim on the merits, where the defendant is in default of appearance or defence
It is appropriate to consider this claim on the merits
Consideration of the claim on the merits
